hadiths.text: It was narrated that ‘Ali said:“The daughter of the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was permitted to me as a bride, and our bed on the night when she was presented to me, was no more than the hide of a ram.”

chapter.ara-name: باب ضِجَاعِ آلِ مُحَمَّدٍ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ
chapter.eng-name: The beds of the family of Muhammad (ﷺ)
